title: Vietnam, Australia's war
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Veterans - Australia - Health aspects
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Psychological aspects
description: Examines Australia's involvement in the Vietnam Conflict, 1962-72 using archival footage, stills, maps, home movies and newspaper headlines. Presents a chronological sequence of events during this period and queries Australia's involvement. Addresses the long-term health and emotional effects of the conflict on veterans and their families.
